pr_title: Add maven plugin for proto lock

timeline.message: Add maven plugin for proto lock.
Add maven plugin for proto lock.
Add maven plugin for proto lock.

timeline.bodyText:
please add definition of this artifact dependency  to root/pom.xml under
<dependencyManagement>

  
    
      alluxio/pom.xml
    
    
         Line 199
      in
      0d149a8
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <dependencyManagement> 
        
    
  


like
      <dependency>
        <groupId>com.salesforce.servicelibs</groupId>
        <artifactId>proto-backwards-compatibility</artifactId>
        <version>1.0.5</version>
      </dependency>

Then in this core/transport/pom.xml, you only need to refer to the artifact without specifying the version
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.salesforce.servicelibs</groupId>
        <artifactId>proto-backwards-compatibility</artifactId>
        <configuration>
          <protoSourceRoot>${basedir}/target/classes/</protoSourceRoot>
        </configuration>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <goals>
              <goal>backwards-compatibility-check</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
timeline.author: apc999
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -133,6 +134,23 @@
         </executions>
       </plugin>
 
+      <!-- Proto lock for preventing backwards compatibility issues -->

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the tip. I've updated the PR.
replies.author: timmylicheng

timeline.message: Move plugin version to root pom.
Move plugin version to root pom.
